title: The Eve of Midsummer
description: Felicia Craig, attractive model turned call-girl, comes to stay with her old friend Joanna in a sleepy village, escaping from an unsavoury past...However, all is not right, and Felicia is all too soon caught up in a maelstrom of sinister events culminating in the terrifying Eve of Midsummer.
author: Jack D. Shackleford
